note: Yet another Twitter refugee because sometimes you gotta draw a line. Coastal, liberal, but far from elite. If you don’t believe that everyone deserves healthcare and that it needs to be separated from employment in the US, then you probably don’t want to follow me. When you cry “Freedom of Speech!” to demand that your opinions be heard and then demand book bans at your local school board meeting because you don’t like the content, I think you’re a tool.
